headline: Report: Breast-feeding increase could save more than 800,000 lives annually
content: By Kelly Wallace, CNNUpdated 1441 GMT (2241 HKT) January 29, 2016 Kelly Wallace is CNN's digital correspondent and editor-at-large covering family, career and life. Read her other columns, and follow her reports at CNN Parents and on Twitter. (CNN)I've written before about how I simply don't get how we in the United States remain so squeamish about breast-feeding -- and how despite all the research that 'breast is best,' many U.S. hospitals are still not providing women with breast-feeding support.
